The claim is based on a photograph publi: a tabloid known for sensational and unverified stories.
The claim relies on the opinion of a pho: Mitch Goldstone, who stated that the unidentified man in the photo with Lee Harvey Oswald "looks to be the same person" as Rafael Cruz, but did not definitively confirm his identity.
The claim is supported by Donald Trump: who asserted that the Cruz camp "never denied" the authenticity of the photo, although it is unclear what specific denials were made or not made.
